loans.name: Kamsot

texts.en: Kamsot is a 31-year-old married woman with a dependent child in her care. She lives in the Takeo Province in Cambodia. For earning a living, she sells sweets and she has been in this business for over nine years. Her husband is 28 years old and he is a veterinarian. Kamsot and her husband can earn approximately $15 per day. She is requesting a loan because she wants to buy cows to fatten and breed for calves to sell. With the loan, she will be able to improve the family’s finances. For her future plans, she is going to buy more cows, build a bigger house and support her only child to finish high school.

loans.use: to buy cows to fatten and breed for calves to sell

loans.name: Uguloy

texts.en: Uguloy is a kind and hardworking woman. She is married and her husband is a master of repairing houses. Uguloy also works hard to earn for living. She has own business deal more than 15 years. Uguloy has been busy with buying and selling fruits in a local market. Uguloy has a selling place in a local market. Her working day begins early morning every day. She goes to the market, buys fruits in a bulk from farmers and retails during day in market for local market. She periodically renews the assortment of her goods because the business struggle in a local market is big. She is asking for a loan of 3000 Somoni to buy fruits for increasing working capital. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fruits for increasing working capital

loans.name: Mutabar

texts.ru: Это женщина Мутабар. Ей 44 года. Она из района Бохтар. Мутабар мать троих детей. У нее 1 дочка и 3 сыновья. Сыновьям 21 и 11. Дочке 19 лет. Муж Мутабар занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Ее старший сын находится на заработках в загранице. Младший сын учится в школе. Дочка домохозяйка, она помогает маме в работе. Сама Мутабар опытная рукодельница. Она у себя дома зарабатывает на жизнь. Мутабар 10 лет занимается шитьем. Ей в этой бизнесе нравится ежедневный доход, и общаться  с новыми клиентами. Ее дочка выходит замуж. Мутабар готовиться к свадьбе дочери. Она из-за нехватки денежных средств обратилась за кредитом. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет Мутабар успешно проводить свадебное мероприятие. Мутабар надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
This woman is Mutabar. She is 44 years old. She is from the Bohtar region. Mutabar is the mother of three children. She has one daughter and two sons. The sons are 21 and 11 years old. The daughter is 19 years old. Mutabar's husband is a master builder. Her eldest son is abroad as a migrant worker. The youngest son goes to school. Her daughter is a housewife. She helps her mother with the work.

Mutabar is an experienced needlewoman. She earns a living from home. She has worked with sewing for ten years. She likes the daily income of this business and she likes to talk to customers.

Mutabar's daughter is getting married. Mutabar is preparing for the wedding. Due to a lack of money she applied for a loan. The requested loan will help Mutabar successfully hold a wedding party. Mutabar needs your support.

loans.use: to hold a wedding party for her daughter

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 40 years old. He is married and he lives with his wife  in the town of Rizal, in the province of Zamboanga del Norte, in the Philippines. Albert  has very good personal and work references from the residents in this area.

Albert has worked in his farm to earn a living for the family for 4 years. He is seeking a loan to invest in improving his farm to buy organic fertilizer for his banana farm. 

In the future, he wants to buy hectares of land for the expansion of his farm in order to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his banana farm

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 63 years old and married with one child. With one child still in school, Juanita works very hard to provide for them.

Juanita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

Juanita has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noddles, snack foods, sugar, coffee, etc.

Juanita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Ma. Octavia

texts.en:
Ma. Octavia works hard to support her family. Ma. Octavia is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Ma. Octavia requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients like tempura, fish ball, balut, etc. to sell.

Ma. Octavia has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Ma. Octavia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like tempura, fish ball, balut, etc. to sell

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is a 42-year-old married woman. Her financial condition is not good. She has to think many times before starting any task. Now her son has just started to drive a moto-rickshaw (a type of three-wheeled rickshaw that includes a motorbike). This rickshaw is being driven over local roads and for small distances. Its body is made of polyester, which is not strong enough to bear the jerks over the roads. Now, the rickshaw body needs to be replaced because it rattles when driven. This is the reason he wants to buy a new body for his moto-rickshaw.

Irshad has requested a loan so that her son can buy the moto-rickshaw body and drive it smoothly.

Irshad thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a moto-rickshaw body for her son so he can provide the best service to his passengers.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en: Alfred is a retailer and at the same time growing and trading in cocoa that add him more income. He is a father of 6 children, married and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is faced with challenges of inadequate capital and increasing transport costs which reduce his anticipated profits, these hinder progress of his businesses. However, he has hopes of expanding retail business and also educate his three children to University. He has asked for a loan to add capital in his retail and cocoa business for sell.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for the shop and cocoa for selling

loans.name: Mengrung

texts.en:
Mengrung, aged 27, is a married woman who is blessed with three dependent children. One of her children is in school while the remaining two are under age of school. She lives in Kampong Cham province where she and her husband have been selling grocery items for 8 years. She sometimes works for others for a fee to get additional income. 
Since she is in need of working capital, she is applying for a loan from VisionFund to buy more grocery items to replenish the store. She believes when the store is filled with various kinds of items, there will be more customers. Therefore, she can earn more income to send her children to school and to buy school supplies.

loans.use: To buy more grocery items to replenish the store in order to attract more customer.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Chamreoun's Group

texts.en: Chamreoun’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Chamreoun makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Met's Group

texts.en: Met’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Met work as farmer to support his family. In his village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Teresita requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for 13 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Teresita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 43 years old and has three children. Arlene is married and two of her children are in school.

Arlene is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Arlene requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Arlene has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. Erlinda is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Erlinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Erlinda has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 42 years old and has four children. Lucita is married and has four children who are in school.

Lucita is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucita requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Lucita has been in this business for 6 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Lucita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Savang's Group

texts.en: Savang’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Savang works as a farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. In her village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Socheat's Group

texts.en: Socheat’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Socheat works as a farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer and construction worker to support her family. In her village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Lunh's Group

texts.en: Lunh’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Lunh works as farmer and he also does extra work as factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Fauzia

texts.en:
Fauzia is a married mother of two children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past five years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and competition in her business.
With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 50,000 she wants to purchase a  stock of new clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a  stock of new clothes for resale

loans.name: Nov's Group

texts.en: Nov’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Nov works as farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women  to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Jiqiang

texts.en:
Jiqiang is 47 years old and lives with his wife and two children. Both children are at school. He also needs to support his parents. He engages in selling electric motorcycles and tricycles in nearby communities. He has been running this business for five years with the help of his wife.
Because of the influence of the bad economy this year, his business is not very good. Since he earns his daily living from the business for his family and to pay his two children's daily education fees, it is hard to pay the house rent. For this reason, he requested CNY 15,000 from Microcred to pay the house rent.

Jiqiang hopes that his children will be professionals and he hopes to send them to university with income earned from the business. He also hopes to be able to buy a new house for the family.

loans.use: to pay the house rent

loans.name: Helina

texts.en:
Helina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy and sell of rice business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Helina has been in this business for 13 years now.

In the future, Helina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Aireen

texts.en:
Aireen is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Aireen is 35 years old and one of her children is in school.

Aireen has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines. Aireen requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy shirts, underwear, shoes, etc.

Aireen has been in this business for one year. In the future, Aireen would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy shirts, underwear, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Sophorn's Group

texts.en: Sophorn’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sophorn works as farmer and she also does extra work as factory laborer and construction worker to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru:
Настоящий праздник для детей это проходит возле лавки Манзуры. Она каждому походящему ребенку дает конфетку. Она хочет просто подарить настроение себе и окружающим - Манзура настоящий человек праздник. 
   Манзура живет на районе Спитамен. Ей 52 год. Продажей конфет она занялась 10 лет назад. С тех пор она не хочет менять свою жизнь, она считает, что это ее призвание в жизни. 
   Манзура решила расширить бизнес. Она хочет расширить свою лавку и привезти новые виды конфет и печеней. Она верит, что найдутся люди, которые помогут осуществить ее план.
texts.en:
The children's holiday takes place near Manzura's shop. She gives each child candy because she simply wants to raise her spirits and those of the people around her. Manzura has the holiday spirit. 

Manzura lives in the Spitamen district and is 52 years old. She started selling candy ten years ago and has never wanted to change her profession because she feels it is her calling in life. 

Manzura decided to expand her business. She wants to expand her shop and bring in new kinds of candies and cookies. She believes that there are people who will help her implement her plan.

loans.use: to purchase candy and cookies

loans.name: Surayo

texts.en: Surayo was born in 1980. She is divorced and has three children. She is the only provider for her children. Her children hope only from her. Surayo loves her children and works hard to earn for the living and education of her children. One year ago she started her own business dealing with food. She has a food shop where she sells different kinds of food items such as milk products, meat products, bread, sugar, pasta, etc. Surayo always sells fresh products. She tries to attract more customers in this way. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy food items for increasing working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy food items for increasing working capital

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en: Edgar is 47 years old and married with three children. He lives in Gata Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a motorcycle transport business in the local community to earn extra income for a living. He has been with his business for over five years and earns 5,000 PHP every month aside from his monthly salary as a security guard in a private company. He has been with GDMPC since 2010 and is now requesting a loan of 18,000 PHP to repair and purchase spare parts. He dreams of helping his children complete their education.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for motor repair.

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Малохат. Ей 46 лет. Она замужняя женщина и мать двоих детей. Малохат живет с семьей на районе Спитамен. Она занимается продажей фруктов. В любую погоду, в любое время года она выходит на работу. В торговой деятельности Малохат уже 10 лет. Она настолько влюблена в свою работу, что не хочет сменить деятельность. Общение с новыми людьми, приятные коллеги делают ее будни интересными и неповторимыми. 
   Малохат решила привезти новые фрукты и для этого она просит кредит. На заемные деньги она привезет новый товар и привлечет внимание покупателей.
texts.en:
This is Malohat. She is 46 years old. She is a married woman and the mother of two children. Malohat lives with her family in the Spitamen region. She works with selling fruit. She goes to work in all weather, at all times of year.

Malohat has worked with retail sales for ten years already. She loves this work and would like to stay in it. Talking to new people and nice colleagues makes her weekdays interesting and unique.

Malohat decided to bring in new fruit and requests a loan for this. For the loan amount she will bring in new goods and attract new customers.

loans.use: to purchase and transport fruit

loans.name: Shumaila

texts.en:
Shumaila is a 30-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan, with her spouse and three children.

Her husband has been running a small printing press for many years. He also prints advertisement banners and logos on order. Flex is a sheet of polythene widely used to deliver high-quality digital print for outdoor banners, mainly printed by large color plotters. These prints are used instead of hand-written banners for their low cost and durability.

He belongs to a poor family and is the only responsible person for his children and old parents. His parents remain sick most of the time, and he has to spend most of his income upon their cure. He wants to grow his business so he can easily generate more income than in the past so he can cherish his children and can bear the medical expenses of his parents.

Therefore, Shumaila has requested a Kiva loan so her husband can buy polythene sheets and color plotters to print more flex. In this way he can easily generate additional income for his family. Shumaila deserves Kiva support and she hopes that the Kiva lenders will support her. She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy polythene sheets and color plotters for her husband's printing press.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is 39 years old and married with two children.

Aurelia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like candies, noodles, diapers, shampoo, sanitary pads, coffee, juice, etc. to sell.

Aurelia has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from raising livestock and farming sugarcane.

Aurelia aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items like candies, noodles, diapers, shampoo, sanitary pads, coffee, juice, etc. to sell

loans.name: Matsekha Ladies Group

texts.en:
Keletso is a 55-year-old mother of three children aged between 14 and 6 years. All her children go to school during weekdays. She lives with her unemployed husband who works in their fields to produce food and care for their livestock. The only means of income is by selling livestock and crops.

Keletso lives in a traditional hut that is not well ventilated and does not warm up well in winter. She works long hours to ensure there is enough food for the family on a daily basis, and only gets help on Saturdays and Sundays from her children. She has to wake up very early, between 4:00 a.m. and 5:00 a.m., during the week to start preparing the fire for cooking breakfast, heating water, and warming the house for herself, and her day begins.

Collecting firewood, setting up the fire, and doing the actual cooking demands a lot of her time. Temperatures in the Lesotho highlands are never really high; winters can get very cold, and often Keletso has to start the fire inside her hut. Starting a fire releases smog and smoke, which, when inhaled in large quantities over a period of time, can lead to lung diseases, eye problems, and in the worst case, to death. In these circumstances, life for women like Keletso has been very difficult.

Keletso has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, in order to be able to purchase a clean cookstove. These will provide her, and seven other people from her village who are living in similar circumstances, the chance of cooking in a way that does not harm them and their families and that does not require a lot of fuel, which is hard to find in Lesotho, nor expensive paraffin and gas. This stove can be started with the use of very little, readily available biomass like dry twigs and dry cow dung that do not require lengths of time to collect. It does not produce smoke while burning, thus making it safe to be used inside the homes.

This stove comes with a solar panel for charging the battery, which runs the fan in the stove, a USB port for charging phones, and a mini LED lamp. This is a life-improving package for these people. This stove saves them time to be with their families, saves energy, eliminates the element of toxic inhalation and house-burning, and has given them the freedom to have a better-lit home to see better in the evening while cooking, and enables children to do their homework.

For stove info, please check www.africancleanenergy.com.

loans.use: to pay for the ACE cookstove, which will improve her life in terms of health, cost of fuel, and the time she spends collecting firewood.

loans.name: Sabi Jooksi

texts.es:
Sabi de 37 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, no siguió la universidad ya que sus recursos económicos no le alcanzaban para seguir,  se acompañó y su esposo actualmente se dedica a la agricultura, en su casa viven su suegra y dos cuñadas, ya que su única hija se acompañó y vive aparte.

Sabi desde los 4 años se dedica a la venta de tamales y mariscos pues acompañaba a su madre desde muy pequeña y fue así como aprendió este oficio, ella antes trabajó como doméstica en una casa pero lo que ganaba no le alcanzaba, después pensaron con su esposo dedicarse a la compra de camarón y comenzaron a venderlo en su cantón, ellos compran el producto en su cantón vecino que está a 5km de su hogar, para llegar hasta allá lo hacen en un pick up, luego lo van a vender casa por casa y trabajan de 5:00 AM a 3:00 PM.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar camarones, pescados y punches para surtir el negocio y tener más ganancias.

Ella sueña con tener una mejor casa y comprar una vaca para vender leche y sus derivados.
texts.en:
Sabi is 37-years old. She went to school until high school and did not continue on to college because her economic resources were not enough to go on. She got married and her husband currently works in agriculture. In her house live her mother-in-law and two sisters-in-law because her only daughter got married and lives on her own.

For 4 years, Sabi has worked selling tamales and seafood. She went along with her mother from a young age and this was how she learned this trade. She used to work as a maid in a house but what she earned was not enough. Afterwards, with her husband, they thought about working in buying shrimp and they began to sell it in their canton. They buy the product in their neighborhood canton that is 5km from their home. To get there, they take a pickup and later go selling door-to-door, working from 5 AM to 3 PM.

She is asking for a loan to buy shrimp, fish, and crab to supply the business and have more earnings. She dreams of having a better house and to buy a cow to sell milk and its byproducts.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, fish and crabs to supply his business and have more earnings.

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es:
Carlos, de 19 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado en la escuela de la comunidad, está acompañado y tiene un hijo de 1 año de edad.	

Carlos, se dedica a la pesca artesanal, esta labor la realiza desde muy pequeño porque su padre también trabaja en la pesca artesanal; este tipo de trabajo se puede realizar en la noche y en el día; su pareja es la encargada de comercializar los maricos que el extrae.

Carlos, necesita el préstamo para comprar una lancha y un motor porque el equipo con el que cuenta actualmente está en mal estado y le dificulta realizar su labor.

El sueño principal de Carlos, es comprar un apero más grande.
texts.en:
Carlos is 19-years old. He went to school until the ninth grade in the community school. He is married and has a 1-year old son. Carlos works in artesinal fisheries. He has done this job since he was little because his father also worked in artesinal fisheries. He can do this type of work night and day. His wife is in charge of selling the seafood that he gets.

Carlos needs the loan to buy a boat and motor because the equipment that he currently has is in bad condition and it is hard for him to do his job.

loans.use: to buy a boat and motor because the equipment that he currently has is in bad condition and it is hard for him to do his job.

loans.name: Roxana Dinora

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive Roxana es de origen humilde y en ella habita con sus 3 hijos de 20, 18 y 16 años de edad a los que ha logrado sacar adelante como madre soltera. Roxana se dedica a la venta de sopa de gallina y tamales, además ella cuenta con una pequeña granja de pollos, los cuales vende obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos. Roxana desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda, ya que en las paredes se hace anidación de plagas que causan enfermedades a su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena y mano de obra para repellar las paredes de su vivienda y brindar mayor sanidad a su hogar.
texts.en: The house that Roxana lives in is humble and with her live her 3 children, ages 20, 18 and 16, who she has managed to support as a single mother. Roxana works selling chicken soup and tamales. She also has a small farm of chickens which she sells to get a better income. Roxana wants to plaster the walls of her home because pests have nested on her walls which cause her family to get sick. So, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and pay labor to plaster the walls of her home and to give her home greater cleanliness.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and pay labor to plaster the walls of her home and to give her home greater cleanliness.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia Nelly se sigue dedicándose a su negocio de crianza y venta de pollos y cuyes, para esta labor ella necesito muchos años de experiencia y conocer más el ciclo de desarrollo de estos animales.
La socia necesita el préstamo para compra cuyes y pasto. 
la socia está muy contenta con el préstamo ya que le ayudara mucho en su negocio, se compromete a apagar puntualmente su deuda.
texts.en: Nelly continues working raising and selling chickens and guinea pigs. For this job she need many years of experience and to know the development cycle of these animals. She needs a loan to buy guinea pigs and grass. She is very happy with the loan that will help her a lot in her business. She promises to pay her debt on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and grass.

loans.name: Maria Gladis

texts.es:
María Gladys con 56 años de edad, de estado civil casada,vive en casa propia,junto a su esposo y su hijo, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de carneros y aves de corral. Su esposo percibe ingresos por servicio agrícola en DIROSE (Rosales S.A), desde hace más de 02 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de carneros para su negocio y gastos familiares. De esta manera tendrá mayores ingresos por incremento de stock de productos,ofreciendo al público y generando ingresos para una mejora en su calidad de vida.

María Gladys es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
María Gladys, 56 years old, is married and lives in her own house with her husband and son, in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, in the country of Peru. She has many good personal and work references from the people in the area. The inhabitants of this place work primarily in agriculture, trade and raising animals.

She works raising and selling sheep and poultry. Her husband has gotten income for agriculture service in DIROSE (Rosales SA) for over 2 years. She asks for the loan to purchase sheep for her business and for family expenses. In this way, she will have more income to increase her stock of products, selling them to the public and generating income for an improvement in her quality of life.

María Gladys is a returning borrower for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for her business and for family expenses.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, de 39 años de edad, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a los trabajos de la agricultura y viven en casa propia con sus dos hijos.

Carmen, tiene 3 años de trabajar en la venta de frutas picada, el lugar donde vende es en la calle principal que conduce a la comunidad, este pequeño negocio lo inicio para ayudar económicamente en su casa, porque los ingresos de su pareja no cubrían todos los gastos; su horario de venta es de 8:00 a.m. a 12:00 m.d.
 
Carmen, necesita el préstamo para construir un nuevo cafetín para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y poder vender otros productos, para cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus clientes.

El sueño principal de Carmen, es brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos, para que sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Carmen is 39-years old. She is married and her husband works in agricultural. They live in their own home with their two children. Carmen has been working for 3 years selling fruit pieces. She sells on the main street that goes into the community. She started this small business to economically help in her house because her husband's income doesn't cover all of the expenses. Her selling schedule is from 8AM to 12PM.

Carmen needs the loan to build a new cafe to better serve her customers and be able to sell other products in order to cover her customer's basic needs. Carmen's big dream is to give her children a good education so that they become successful professionals.

loans.use: to build a new cafe to better serve her customers and be able to sell other products.

loans.name: Eleazar

texts.es:
Eleazar, de 19 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está soltero y actualmente vive con sus padres.

Eleazar, se dedica a los trabajos de la agricultura junto a su padre, pero también se dedica al comercio y crianza de cerdos desde hace 3 años, este trabajo decidió ejercerlo debido a la necesidad que existía en su familia, porque no tenían muchos ingresos económicos para cubrir los gastos de la casa.
 
Eleazar, necesita el préstamo para comprar más cerdos y concentrado para que se engorden.

El sueño de Eleazar, es construir su propia casa para formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Eleazar, 19, studied until sixth grade. He is single and is currently living with his parents.

He works with his father in agriculture, but has also been running a business raising and selling pigs for the past three years. He decided to do this to help his family, because they do not have a lot of income to pay for the household expenses.

He needs this loan to buy more pigs and food to fatten them.

His dream is to build his own home and form his own family.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and food to fatten them.

loans.name: Emérita Santos

texts.es:
Emérita, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la albañilería y juntos tienen 1 hija que estudia en la escuela de la comunidad.	

Emérita, junto a su pequeña familia se dedican a trabajar en la agricultura, específicamente a sembrar maíz y frijoles; ellos lo realizan desde hace 10 años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de pescado, pero dejo de hacerlo para ayudarle a su pareja.

Emérita, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, insecticidas, foliares y fungicidas para sus cultivos, porque necesita aplicarlos en el momento indicado, para asegurar una buena cosecha.

El sueño de Emérita, es comprar 2 vacas, para criarlas y procesar la leche para elaborar lácteos.
texts.en:
Emérita, 33 years old, went to school up to the third grade. She is partnered, her partner works in construction and together they have 1 daughter who goes to the community school.

Emérita, with her little family, works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans. They have done this for 10 years, previously she worked selling fish, but she left that to help her partner.

Emérita needs the loan to purchase fertilizer, insecticides, liquid fertilizers for leaves, and fungicides for her crops because she needs to apply them at the right time to assure a good harvest.

Emérita's dream is to purchase 2 cows, to raise them and process the milk to make dairy products.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, liquid fertilizers for leaves, and fungicides for her crops.

loans.name: Edwin Balmore

texts.es:
Edwin de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa es ama de casa, con ella tiene dos hijos, en casa de Edwin también vive su abuela a quien el cuida.

Edwin trabaja en la agricultura desde los 12 años, oficio que aprendió de su padre. Actualmente siembra 10,000 mts cuadrados de cultivo de maíz y yuca, también tiene 6 años de trabajar como barrendero en el municipio donde él habita, por lo cual tiene que trasladarse todos los días en autobús, para lograr llegar a su trabajo donde labora de 6:30 AM hasta las 3.00 PM

El crédito será utilizado para comprar ganado. 

Edwin cumplirá uno de sus sueños  con el otorgamiento del crédito el cual es de tener ganado y  además le gustaría tener un vehículo para poder trabajar vendiendo frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
Edwin, 29, studied until the end of high school. He is married and his wife works as a housewife. Together they have two children. Edwin's grandmother also lives in the house so that they can look after her.

Edwin has worked in agriculture since he was 12. He learnt this trade from his father. He currently sows 10,000 m² of corn and yucca. In addition, he has also been working as a street cleaner for six years in the area where he lives. He has to travel to work every day on the bus. He starts at 6:30 AM and finishes at 3 PM.

He will use the loan to realise one of his dreams, which is to own his own cattle. He would also like to have his own vehicle, so he can use it to sell fruit and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Sandra Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sabina de 24 años de edad, estudio enfermería, esta soltera y no tiene hijos y por lo tanto solo vive solo con su abuela.


Sabina aprendió el oficio de siembra de granos básicos y crianza de ganado, por medio de su abuela, quien toda su vida se ha dedicado a estas actividades. Actualmente ella trabaja en una clínica medica desde hace un año y en los momentos libres continua ayudando a su abuela en la siembra de cultivo de maíz y criando ganado, el área de siembra son 7,000 mts cuadrados y tienen 2 novillos. 

El crédito sera invertido para comprar 2 novillos, de esta forma podrá continuar creciendo la actividad de crianza de ganado. 

El sueño de Sabina es seguirse preparando en el área de enfermería y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su abuela.
texts.en:
Sabina, 24 years old, studied nursing, is single, and doesn't have children so she lives with just her grandmother.

Sabina learned the trade of growing basic grains and raising animals from her grandmother, who has worked in these tasks her whole life. Currently, she has worked at a medical clinic for a year and in her free time she continues helping her grandmother in growing the corn crops and raising cattle. The area they plant is 7,000 square meters and they have 2 calves.

The loan will be invested in the purchase of 2 calves, in this way she will be able to continue growing the activity of raising cattle.

Sabina's dram is to continue studying in the area of nursing and to improve her quality of life and that of her grandmother.

loans.use: to purchase 2 calves.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
Felicita, manifiesta sentirse muy agradecida por el apoyo brindado, ya que gracias a ello ha logrado seguir fabricando piezas de loza, con lo que sus ingresos han mejorado considerablemente y ha podido ofrecerle una vida más digna a sus familia.
Nuevamente solicita un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materiales como lo son; barro, arenilla, nacazcol y piedrín; le servirán en su negocio tanto como para la elaboración de los artículos que ella ofrece, así como para su comercialización, con esto ella busca poder percibir más ingresos que le continúen ayudando a la estabilidad familiar y poder cancelar su crédito con la puntualidad necesaria.
texts.en:
Felicita is very grateful for the support she has received, which has allowed her to carry on making her crockery products. Her income has improved considerably as a result, allowing her to provide a more dignified lifestyle to her family.

She is asking for a new loan to buy material for her business such as clay, sand, black dye and gravel.

This will help her business, both in making and selling her products. She hopes to further increase her profits and continue to help her family live comfortably. She also aims to pay off the loan in the allocated time.

loans.use: to buy materials for her pottery business.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza con 50 años de edad,de estado civil viuda, vive junto a su menor hija, en el distrito de Pucará,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Esperanza se dedica a la de venta de cerveza y tragos, cuenta con un bar picanteria, ubicada en su propio domicilio,cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio por lo que cuenta con bastante clientela.Solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo compra de cerveza y arreglo de su local.

Esperanza es socio exclusivo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Esperanza, 50, is a widow. She lives with her youngest daughter in Pucara, in the province of Jaen, Peru. This belongs to the regional office of Cajamarca.

She is well considered, both as a professional and as a person, by the people who live in the area. The majority of the local population work in agriculture, commerce or livestock.

Esperanza sells beer and drinks. She has a bar which sells snacks, located in her own home. She has been running this business for more than 10 years, so she has built up a good customer base.

She is asking for this loan to generate capital so she can buy beer and carry out repair work on her bar.

She is only a member with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to generate capital for her business to buy products and make repairs.

loans.name: Claudia Cecilia

texts.es: Claudia de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 13 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes especialmente sus vecinos, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz por quintales y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Claudia is 30 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her three children.

Claudia has been making a living selling tortillas for 13 years. Her business is located in her home. She has many customers, particularly neighbours. Claudia is able to cover some household costs with profits from sales.

Claudia is applying for a loan in order to buy corn by the hundredweight and thus earn a higher income

loans.use: to buy corn by the hundredweight.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda continua dedicándose a su negocio de venta de quesos, ella sigue luchando por ampliar su negocio, por eso ella solicito el préstamo para comprar quesos. 
Ella ofrece su producto durante casi toda la semana.la socia es muy trabajadora y responsable, por eso se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas acordadas. y agrádese a los inversionista de KIVA.
texts.en:
Hilda is still in the business of selling cheese. She is trying to expand her business, so she is asking for a loan to buy a variety of cheese.

She sells her produce almost every day of the week. She is very hard-working and responsible, therefore, she promises to pay off the instalments on time.

She is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Alex Guillermo

texts.es: Alex es un hombre trabajador de 44 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 17 y 8 años de edad a los que apoya en sus estudios. Él se dedica a la fabricación de calzado, lo que le permite brindar lo necesario a su familia, por lo que se siente muy feliz de contar con esta fuente de ingresos. Alex desea construir el baño y pila de su vivienda, ya que estos son tan necesarios para la sanidad de su hogar, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir la pila y baño de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Alex is 44 years old and lives with his wife and two children, ages seventeen and eight years old. Alex supports his children with their education.

Alex makes a living producing footwear, which allows him to provide necessities to his family. Alex is therefore very happy to have this source of income.

Alex wants to build a bathroom and sink in his home as these are necessary for Alex and his family to maintain good health. Alex is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron bars to build a sink and bathroom in his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron bars to build a sink and bathroom in his home.

loans.name: Noriel

texts.es:
Noriel con 47 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus hijos, en el distrito de San Felipe,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú .Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y agricultura.

Noriel se dedica a la fabricación de productos de madera, cuenta con carpintería propia, con más de 15 años de experiencia en el negocio. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de una cinta circular una herramienta que le va ser de mucha utilidad en su taller para realizar sus trabajos. De esta manera podrá adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida de él y la de su familia.

Noriel es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Noriel is 47 years old. He lives with his partner and children in the San Felipe district of the Jaen province. Jaen is in the department of Cajamarca, in Peru. The locals here mostly make a living in farming and trade.

Noriel himself makes a living producing wooden products. He has his own carpentry workshop and more than 15 years' experience with the business. This loan will be used to invest in a circular sanding belt, which will be very useful for jobs in Noriel's workshop. He can thus earn an acceptable profit and improve his and his family's quality of life.

Noriel is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy a circular sanding belt, which will be very useful for doing jobs at his workshop.

loans.name: Grupo El Calvario 1 Group

texts.es:
Susana es una mujer de 26 años de edad, es casada con una linda familia de un hijo de ua año de edad, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Susana (la que se ubica en medio de las tres)  con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica prestando el servicio de internet en su comunidad, ella tiene apenas 4 meses de realizarlo, pero afortunadamente ha tenido éxito con este negocio, pues es el único centro que presta este servicio. Gracias a la demanda que  su negocio posee Susana se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de mercaderías para su negocio tales como; memorias de usb, audífonos, cartuchos para impresoras.
El gran anhelo de Susana es poder fortalecer su negocio  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Susana is 26 years old. She is married and has a nice family with a one-year-old son. They live in the community of Solola.
Susana (the woman in the middle), in an effort to earn an income and support her family, provides internet services to her community. She has only been running the business for four months, but fortunately it has been successful, since her center is the only one that provides this service. Thanks to the demand that her business faces, Susana needs to apply for a loan in order to buy supplies such as USB drives, headsets and printer cartridges.
Susana's big dream is to strengthen her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as USB drives, headsets and printer cartridges.

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es: Víctor es un gran hombre que todos los días busca superarse para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, él cuenta que con el crédito que recibió pudo comprar sus semillas y fertilizantes y así su cultivo pudo brindarle su mantenimiento, afortunadamente le dejo  buenas ganancias, Víctor busca un nuevo préstamo para la compra la de semillas de papa y fertilizantes, pues la época de  verano ya se acerca y esta verdura es adecuada para esta época. Sus aspiraciones en la vida son seguir incrementando el cultivo, mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor is a great man who seeks to excel so that he can improve the living conditions of his family. He says that with the last loan he received, he was able to buy his seeds and fertilizer and therefore could maintain his crop. Fortunately, he made a good profit.

Víctor is requesting a new loan to buy seed potatoes and fertilizers since summer is coming and this vegetable is suitable to grow in this season.

His aspirations in life are to continue increasing his crop and to give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes and fertilizers.

loans.name: Kaneez

texts.en:
Kaneez is a 58-year-old mother of seven children living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son is a turner by profession and has been operating a lathe for many years. He takes orders for manufacturing vehicle spare parts, and has to complete orders on time. For manufacturing purposes he utilizes cutting tools, dice and miscellaneous tools. With the passage of time and due to continuously working on the lathe, many important tools have been wearing out. He wants to buy new tools, but due to their high cost he is unable to purchase them from the market.

Kaneez has requested a loan for her son so that he can buy tools and operate the lathe again smoothly. In this way he can easily continue his manufacturing business and can complete his orders on time.

Kaneez hopes that this loan will prove productive for the business as well as for her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools for her son so he can operate his lathe and complete his manufacturing orders on time.

loans.name: Ratha

texts.en:
Ratha is a 22-year-old single student who is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in electrical engineering. He is in his fourth year at a university in the city. He is from the Kampong Cham Province in Cambodia. His father is a taxi driver and his mother is a rice farmer.

Ratha lacks the money to cover his university fees from the fourth to his five year, so he has decided to take out a loan. With this loan, he will have enough money to earn a bachelor’s degree and graduate successfully. After graduation, Ratha is going to run his own business, so he will be able to save money to build his own house.

loans.use: to cover his university fees from the fourth to his five year

loans.name: Roseria

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Roseria works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Roseria is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

Roseria has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel de 47 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, está soltero y tiene un hijo. 


Manuel trabaja desde los 12 años, su primer oficio fue de trabajar como jornalero junto a su padre, ahí aprendió a sembrar maíz y frijol. También aprendió el oficio de sastrerías, ya que fue donde un amigo de su papá para que le enseñara este oficio, actualmente está trabajando como sastre y siembra una hectárea de cultivo de maíz.


El crédito será invertido para comprar telas, hilos y ziperes, de esta forma podrá continuar con el negocio de sastrerías.

El sueño de Manuel es mejorar su vivienda y tener un terreno propio donde sembrar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 47 years old. He studied until the 9th grade, he is single and has a son. 

Manuel has been working since he was 12 years old. His first job was as a farm day laborer with his father, where he learned how to plant corn and beans. He also learned the tailoring trade, taught to him by a friend of his father's. He is currently working as a tailor and he plants one hectare of corn crop. 

The loan will be invested to buy fabrics, thread and zippers, so that he may continue with the tailoring business.

Manuel's dream is to improve his home and to have his own land where to plant his crops.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread and zippers so he may continue with the tailoring business

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma works hard to support her family. Emma is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing nets and materials for the repair of her fishing boat. Emma has been in this business for 11 years now.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing nets and materials for the repair of her fishing boat

loans.name: Morng's Group

texts.en:
Morng’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Morng works as a farmer and he also does extra work as a factory laborer to support his family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Evelyn is 53 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Evelyn has a direct-selling business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more products from Avon and Personal Collection to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for four years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products from Avon and Personal Collection to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is 35 years old. She is married and has five children who are in school.

Ma. Teresa is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Ma. Teresa has been in this business for four years now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ma. Teresa would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 56 years old and married with nine children, two of whom are in school. Conchita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, canned goods, noodles, etc.

Conchita has been in this business for 10 years. In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, canned goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Mwende

texts.en:
Mwende is a married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. The major challenge she faces is competition in her place of business.

With the loan she is requesting, Mwende wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Somaly's Group

texts.en: Somaly’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Somaly works as a farmer and he also does extra work as a factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Lay's Group

texts.en: Lay’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Lay makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Kheang's Group

texts.en: Kheang’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Kheang makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a factory laborer and construction worker to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, age 60, is married and lives with her husband and seven children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her financial condition is neither good nor bad; her elder son does not earn enough to contribute to the household expenses.

He is a furniture maker and makes very fine furniture such as wooden beds, chairs, tables, cots, etc. He has been doing this work for 15 years and has a lot of experience. Both of her sons are doing separate jobs, but their income is less than his father’s income.

Recently her husband became sick and most of the savings was spent on his medical treatment. Now he is healed and hearty but does not have the amount to buy raw materials for making furniture. Therefore, Naseem requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her son would be able to buy raw materials such as wooden planks, nails, glue, and chip boards to continue his business.

Naseem thanks Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, and feels happy after this loan.

loans.use: to buy wooden planks, nails, glue, and chip boards for her son's furniture-making business.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 33 years old and married with one child in school. She works very hard to provide for her child.

Remedios runs a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, beverages, home care products, and groceries.

Remedios has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Remedios would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, beverages, home care products, and groceries.

loans.name: Vaen's Group

texts.en:
Vaen’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Vaen works as farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Zhenyu

texts.en:
Zhenyu is a 45-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and her child. Zhenyu and her husband were working outside a few years ago. Because of the poor family conditions, her child didn’t receive much education, which made her very guilty.

Her husband was a valetudinarian. She undertakes the whole family burden. She has run a stall in her community to sell different snacks for seven years. Her husband feeds more than twenty pigs in their hometown, for he cannot do heavy work. Zhenyu will help her husband to feed pigs in her free time.

Zhenyu requested CNY 10,000 from MicroCred. She needs the money to purchase plentiful fodder. She is a hardworking woman, and she believes that she could have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to purchase plentiful fodder

loans.name: Soklim's Group

texts.en: Soklim’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Soklim works as a farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 47 years old and has six children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Roselyn is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Roselyn has been raising livestock for 25 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF five times in the past to sustain her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene  de 51 años de edad, estudió hasta 7º grado, está soltero ya que no pudo convivir con su esposa, tiene dos hijos pero ya viven aparte, con él viven unas sobrinas aunque no dependen económicamente de él.


Rene trabaja de albañil, desde hace 15 años comenzó a trabajar en este oficio,  lo aprendió gracias a que estuvo de ayudante durante un tiempo,  su horario de trabajo es desde las 7:00  AM hasta las 5:00 PM.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

Él solicita este crédito para comprar vacas ya que cuida otro ganado de su hermano y tiene terreno donde cuidarlos.
                    

Él sueña con tener mas vacas y mejorar la situación económica de su familia.
texts.en:
Rene is 51 years old. He studied until the 7th grade and he is single since separating from his wife. He has two children, but they are already living on their own. He lives with a few nieces, but they do not depend on him financially. 

Rene has worked as a builder since starting in this business 15 years ago. He learned it by working as an assistant for some time. His working hours are from 7 am to 5 pm.
                                          
He is requesting a loan to buy cows, since he tends to his brother's cattle and has land in which to keep them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

He dreams of having more cows and of improving the financial situation for his family.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Stephanie

texts.en:
Stephanie is 39 years old, married, and has four children who are all in school.

Stephanie is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Stephanie requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

She has been in the pig fattening business for three years now, and has borrowed from NWTF six times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Stephanie would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Hilda Esperanza

texts.es:
Hilda, de 58 años de edad, está casada, es madre de tres hijos, estudio hasta quinto grado y vive en casa propia. 

Hilda, tiene una tienda en donde vende productos básicos para el hogar, así como refrescos y golosinas; la tienda la tiene desde  hace 8 años y es administrada por la familia; su horario de atención al público es de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m.

Hilda, necesita el préstamo para comprar más productos como frijoles, arroz, aceite, azúcar y bebidas gaseosas.

El sueño principal de Hilda, es tener variedad de productos y hacer más grandes las instalaciones de la tienda, para brindarles una buena atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Hilda, 58 years old, is married, has three children, studied through fifth grade and lives in her own home.

Hilda has a store where she sells basic household products, such as soft drinks and candy. She has been running the shop for 8 years. It is managed by the family and its opening hours are from 6:00 am to 6:00 pm.

Hilda needs a loan to buy more products like beans, rice, oil, sugar and soft drinks.

Hilda's main dream is to sell a greater variety of products and to enlarge the shop facilities to provide a better service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more products like beans, rice, oil, sugar and soft drinks.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, de 26 años de edad, está acompañada y vive con su pareja que trabaja en la agricultura, ella estudio hasta sexto grado y aún no tiene hijos.

María, tiene 6 años de trabajar en la comercialización de ropa, ella decidió trabajar de esa manera para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar; las ventas las realiza de lunes a viernes en el municipio donde vive y su horario es de 8:00 de la mañana a 3:00 de la tarde.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar más ropa para su negocio, porque en los últimos días las ventas han incrementado.

El sueño de María es, que su negocio sea uno de los más grandes de la zona, para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y brindarle a su familia más estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Maria is 26 years old and married. She lives with her husband who works in agriculture. She studied until sixth grade and does not have children.

Maria has been selling cloths for 6 years. She decided to work to help her husband with the household expenses. Sales are carried out from Monday to Friday in the municipality where she lives and her hours are 8am to 3pm.

Maria requests a loan to buy more clothes for her business because the sales have increased recently.

Maria’s dream is to make her business to be one of the largest in the area, to improve her income and give her family more stable finance.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for her business.

loans.name: Lailanie

texts.en:
Lailanie works hard to support her family. Lailanie is married and has a buy and sell ready-to-wear clothes business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years now.

She requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of ready-to-wear clothes to sell like pants, shorts, shirt, etc.

In the future, Lailanie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of ready-to-wear clothes to sell like pants, shorts, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Annalyn

texts.en:
Annalyn, 42, is a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Annalyn has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 22 years.

Annalyn requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fish to sell.

In the future, Annalyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to sell.

loans.name: Nith's Group

texts.en:
Nith’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia.

Nith works as farmer and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help Nith safeguard the health of her family and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en:
Sopheap’s Group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia.

Sopheap makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help Sopheap to safeguard the health of her family and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Damaris Eunice

texts.es:
Damaris de 31 años de edad, estudió ingeniería en sistemas, está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar de seguridad, tiene dos hijos pero solo uno esta estudiando en la escuela.


Damaris trabaja en un micro-negocio, desde hace 4 años comenzó a trabajar así,  consiguió esa oportunidad gracias a sus estudios,   su horario es desde las 7:30 AM hasta las 4:30 PM.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar ropa para poner un negocio con su suegra , el préstamo mejorará su situación económica  para comenzar el negocio.

                    
Ella sueña con que su negocio de ropa sea exitoso y tratará  de invertir mucho para incrementar sus ingresos, ademas desea que sus hijos terminen de estudiar.
texts.en:
Damaris is 31 years old and studied engineering systems. She is married and her husband works in security. She has two children but only one is studying in school.

Damaris has been working in a micro business for 4 years thanks to her studies. Her working hours are from 7:30am to 4:30 PM.

She requested a loan to buy clothes to start a business with her mother-in-law. The loan will improve their economic situation to start the business.

She dreams that her clothing business will be successful and try to invest heavily to increase her income. She also wants her children to finish their schooling.

loans.use: to buy clothes to start a business with her mother-in-law.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador, de 62 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, está soltero y vive con su papá que es un hombre de avanzada edad. 	

Salvador, es agricultor desde que era muy joven, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a su padre y el tiempo que dedica para realizar este trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 12: p.m. 

Salvador, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes e insumos agrícolas para los cultivos que ya tiene sembrados.

Salvador, sueña con poder sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol para poder obtener más ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Salvador, 62 years old, studied until first grade, is single and lives with his dad, who is an elderly man.

Salvador has been a farmer since his early youth. He learned this job from his father. The time he spends at work is from 6:00 am to 12:00 pm.

Salvador needs the loan to buy fertilizers and agricultural inputs for the crops he has already planted.

Salvador dreams of planting 7,000 square meters of beans to earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and agricultural inputs for the crops he has already planted.

loans.name: Ulzii-Utas

texts.en: Ulzii-Utas, who is 28 years old, lives with her husband in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. She has been working as a lithographer at a carpet factory since 2007. Her husband is a cook and works at a bakery. Last year, they built a small house of blocks. Using her previous loan, she has insulated her house, creating comfortable place for living and begin using less coal for heating. Now she is requesting a loan of 500 USD to install vacuum insulated windows into her house in order to further reduce coal usage.

loans.use: to install vacuum insulated windows into her house

loans.name: Vivencia

texts.en:
Vivencia is 53 years old and a mother of six.

Vivencia is a hog raiser while her husband does farming to make a living.

For many years in this field of business, she has earned enough income to support the needs of her children and to sustain them.

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC to purchase feeds and vitamins to feed her boar and piglets.

She hopes to improve their house for a better living for the family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins.

location.town: Gotocan Daku, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Magna Elizabeth

texts.en:
Magna Elizabeth is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Magna Elizabeth is 40 years old and has four children who are in school.

Magna Elizabeth has a yakult vending business in the Philippines. Magna Elizabeth requested a PHP 29000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of yakult to sell to her customers.

Magna Elizabeth has been in this business for 11 years. In the future, Magna Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of yakult to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ma. Fidela

texts.en:
Ma. Fidela is 45 years old and has three children. Ma. Fidela is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Ma. Fidela is in the agricultural business, selling ornamental plants in the Philippines. Ma. Fidela requested a PHP 28000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Ma. Fidela has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Ma. Fidela would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae is 44 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Mae is borrowing PHP 14000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Mae has been in pig fattening for 2 years and also earns additional income from peanut butter making.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Juana Carolina

texts.es:
Juana, de 49 años de edad, está acompañada y vive en casa propia.

Juana, tiene una tienda desde hace 5 años, en la cual vende productos básicos como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, aceite, bebidas gaseosas y golosinas; su horario de atención es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. y el negocio es administrado por ella, pero su familia le ayuda a vender.

Juana, necesita el dinero para comprar más productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite y para comprar una vitrina para tener en mejor estado y visibilidad los productos para sus clientes.

El sueño de Juana, es que su negoció sea mejor cada día y ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juana is 49 years old, married and lives in her own home.

Juana has a shop of 5 years selling staples like beans, rice, sugar, oil, soft drinks and sweets. Their hours are from 6am to 6pm. The shop is run by her but her family helps with the sales.

Juana needs the money to buy more products like rice, sugar, oil and a cabinet to get a better visibility of the products for her customers.

Juana's dream is to make her store better every day and to offer better products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more products like rice, sugar, oil and a cabinet.

loans.name: Miembe Saba B Group

texts.en:
Said who is in his late 30's is married with four kids, two of whom are still in school while others are grown up. He is a taxi driver and also started selling on fashion shoes for fifteen years now. He works from 5am to 11pm daily and is able to make a very good profit each month's.

This will be Said's First loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He will use this loan to increasing on clothes stock and to service his taxi. He dreams of selling shoes at wholesale prices.

Said will share this loan with his loan group MIEMBE SABA B which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase on clothes stock and to service his taxi.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita works hard to support her family. Angelita is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase new fish nets and materials for boat repair.

Angelita has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Angelita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase new fish nets and materials for boat repair

loans.name: Edreda-

texts.en: Edreda is a hardworking woman with one child living in Bundibugyo Uganda. Her business is mainly buying and selling fish on top of cocoa growing for supplementary income. She has a great desire of accumulating more capital and becoming a prominent business woman in her area, although she complains of the difficulty of high transport costs, unpredictable weather changes and limited capital. As we are approach the end of third term, Edreda lack money to cater for her child's school fees dues. She thus needs a loan to pay school fees for her child.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her child.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim aged 36, is the mother of five children. She is an expert with tailoring skills, which is the helping income for the family. She needs to purchase a sewing machine and variety of tailoring material for her business, including threads, needles, etc. This is very important for her to continue her work efficiently and effectively. However, due to the lack of money she finds it difficult.

Therefore Shamim is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her family household expenses. She will purchase the needful things with the help of loan amount. Shamim is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan amount. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: for investing in her sewing business.

loans.name: Takreem

texts.en:
Takreem is a 20-years-old single young man from Khan younis city. His father owns and runs an accessories store. It is the sole source of income for the family. Takreem helps his father in the store, as he manages all accounting matters in the store.

Takreem took a USD murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his father's store . By taking this loan, Takreem will be able to do his accounting work easily. Takreem appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for use as accountant in his father's store.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
